mapper.select: SELECT r.region, rd.region_detail, st.sub_title,st.finish_yn, cl.check_list, cl.finish_yn, t.start_date FROM travel t INNER JOIN sub_title st ON t.id_title = st.id_title INNER JOIN check_list cl ON st.id_sub = cl.id_sub INNER JOIN region_detail rd ON t.id_region_detail = rd.id_region_detail INNER JOIN region r ON rd.id_region = r.id_region ORDER BY start_date desc
